reviewText: I recently discover Patrick's workouts and I really enjoy working out with him, this dvd is fun and the time flies by. I have a lot of exercise dvds including most of the beach body series, Dream Body workouts, Jillian Michaels, Cathe, Pure Barre, The bar Method, Paul Katami, Amy Dixon, Bob Harper, Kelly Coffey, Tracy Mallett, Tracy Anderson and some other and my body is a combination of all the above workouts and I will consider myself advance and this workout was definitely a good workout. According with my heart rate monitor I burned almost 700 calorie.

I did this workout yesterday for the first time... I am sore in muscles that haven't been sore in a long time! I am an extreme exercise enthusist that lives for hardcore workouts. This workout does it!! I found everything about this workout INTENSE!  I workout daily for at least 2 hours a day, so with that said, this is not a beginner workout. I would recommend this to people who have been working out consistently, and past the beginner stage.
A great workout video that focuses on different parts of the body that I didn't know muscles even existed. I would definitely recommend this one to others.
